snippet: Tampa Bay, behind Wil Myers’ three runs batted in, beat slumping Texas to take the lead in the American League wild-card race.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Tampa Bay Rays defeat Texas Rangers, 6-2; other MLB scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay, behind Wil Myers’ three runs batted in, beat slumping Texas to take the lead in the American League wild-card race.

headline.main: Rays Beat Rangers; One-Hitter Halts Pirates
headline.print_headline: Rays Beat Rangers; One-Hitter Halts Pirates
